entry.title: Do Kwon Claims to Have Backed Political Party in Montenegro: Report
entry.summary: Terra co-founder Do Kwon allegedly had financial relations with the leader of a political party in Montenegro.

entry.title: Ex-Oasis Rocker Noel Gallagher Turns to NFTs to Top Foo Fighters in UK Chart Race
entry.summary: It’s a fervent fight to top the album charts, and Noel Gallagher’s High Flying Birds is launching an NFT edition to try and eke out a win.

entry.title: IKEA Research Studio Uses AI to Create a Folding Sofa that Fits in an Envelope
entry.summary: We’re heading towards a future where getting sofas up and down flights of stairs is no longer a Sisyphean chore.

entry.title: US Court Gives SEC One Week to Respond to Coinbase’s Rulemaking Petition
entry.summary: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit has given the SEC seven days to clarify its position on a rulemaking petition from Coinbase.

entry.title: Louis Vuitton to Sell $41,000 NFTs to Top Customers
entry.summary: “Treasure Trunks” is the first in a series of projects to entice the luxury brand’s elite clientele with exclusive perks.

entry.title: 'Black Mirror' Creator Says ChatGPT Episode Script Was 'Shit'
entry.summary: The Emmy winning sci-fi creator found the AI tool only managed to write a subpar mashup of old episodes.

entry.title: Senators Question Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg Over LLaMA AI Model “Leak”
entry.summary: Lawmakers decry the release of Meta’s advanced and uncensored Large Language Model, and ask what the company is doing to minimize its damage.

entry.title: Kevin O’Leary: Binance Will Be 'Starved of Oxygen' by SEC’s Lawsuit
entry.summary: The “Shark Tank” star says today’s top digital asset firms are likely destined to live on only in history books.

entry.title: Tokens Bounce Back Across the Market After SEC Triggers Turmoil
entry.summary: Despite legal actions against the two largest cryptocurrency exchanges, only two tokens are seeing red candles today.

entry.title: SEC Seeks Emergency Order to Freeze Binance US Assets
entry.summary: If granted, the motion requests the repatriation of assets and the preservation of records.

entry.title: Meeting Giant Zoom Launches AI Meeting Summaries and Chat
entry.summary: Despite a crowded marketplace, Zoom has huge market share and is emphasizing real-time results.

entry.title: FTX Looking to Sell Shares in Anthropic Amid AI Boom: Semafor
entry.summary: The collapsed exchange may be looking to sell its $500 million stake in a competitor to OpenAI.

entry.title: Coinbase Plans to Fight SEC Lawsuit, Carry On With 'Business as Usual'
entry.summary: Coinbase legal chief Paul Grewal was in DC to speak at a hearing on the Digital Asset Market Structure Discussion Draft.

entry.title: What Are Possible Uses of ChatGPT?
entry.summary: A key distinction between ChatGPT and earlier chatbot models is that it was developed and trained using a process known as reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF).

entry.title: Coinbase Hit With Pending Cease and Desist Orders From 11 States
entry.summary: California, Illinois, Maryland, and New Jersey were among the states warning Coinbase its staking product does not comply with securities rules.

entry.title: Ignoring Disruptive Blockchain Companies Is a 'Fundamental Mistake': Amplify ETFs
entry.summary: As crypto markets see another dramatic turn of events, some digital asset managers are still betting on Bitcoin miners and other tech disruptors.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gary Gensler: The US Doesn't Need Cryptocurrency
entry.summary: Gary Gensler has said what he really thinks about how crypto exchanges operate in the States.

entry.title: Haun Ventures Leads Argus Labs' $10M Raise for Ethereum Gaming Networks
entry.summary: Argus Labs is building an Ethereum layer-2 network of gaming blockchains via its World Engine, and gamers can code their own on-chain mods.

entry.title: This Bitcoin Tool Could Change the Way Businesses Use Lighting Network
entry.summary: "Now you can make a direct comparison to how much I am paying Visa [or another payment processor] to do my payment processing," Amboss's CEO said.

entry.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan
entry.summary: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Down 18% in Pre-Market Trading in Wake of SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Coinbase's share price was already reeling from the impact of the SEC's lawsuit against rival exchange Binance on Monday.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder's Fractal Launches Tools to Help Devs Build NFT Games
entry.summary: Justin Kan's Fractal has created a code-free way for game developers to "go crypto"—will it pull Web2 developers into the space?

entry.title: SEC Sues Coinbase Over Staking Services, Failing to Register
entry.summary: The SEC alleges Coinbase should have registered as an exchange, clearing house, and broker and that it sold unregistered securities through its staking service.

entry.title: Atomic Wallet Hacker Swapping Stolen Funds for Bitcoin: Elliptic
entry.summary: Elliptic Connect analysts have also linked the stolen crypto from the Atomic Wallet hack to the North Korean hacking group Lazarus.

entry.title: 'Shadow Banker' Reggie Fowler Faces 6 Years in Prison Over $750M in Unregulated Crypto Transfers
entry.summary: Fowler lied to dozens of banks and processed $750 million in transactions despite not having a money transmitting license.

entry.title: 'At Least We Are Regulating,' Says President of Ethereum France on EU Crypto Rules
entry.summary: The Ethereum France President also said that the incoming MiCA regulations are "very close to the test framework" that exists in France.

entry.title: NFT Artist Agoria to Give Fans Ownership Over Upcoming Song Launch
entry.summary: The French electronic music pioneer is handing out a shared stake in royalties to his community of “Agorians.”

entry.title: PEPE Leads Market Losses Amid SEC Crackdown on Binance
entry.summary: The wider crypto market cap dropped to $1.14 trillion amid the latest lawsuit against Binance, with PEPE leading losses.

entry.title: Regulate AI Like Nuclear Power, Says UK Labour Party
entry.summary: A Labour Party spokesperson voiced concerns about the unregulated state of artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Apple Vision Pro vs. Meta Quest 3: What's the Difference?
entry.summary: The Apple Vision Pro costs seven times as much, but will it be that much better of a headset? Here’s what we know so far.

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Silent on Bitcoin and CBDC During Twitter Talk with Elon Musk
entry.summary: He also asked Balaji Srinivasan, Coinbase’s former CTO, to be his Treasury Secretary.

entry.title: Sorry, Gamers—Apple’s Vision Pro Headset Wasn't Made for You
entry.summary: The pricey headset can handle augmented and virtual reality games, but Apple mostly ignored those experiences in the Vision Pro reveal.

entry.title: Institutional Investors Have Pulled $329 Million From Crypto Funds Since April
entry.summary: CoinShares wrote that the withdrawals could be investors pulling seed capital out of funds, rather than "anything more ominous."

entry.title: Binance Condemns SEC’s ‘Blunt Weapons of Enforcement’
entry.summary: The world’s biggest cryptocurrency exchange is “disheartened” by the American regulator’s latest action.

entry.title: SEC Quietly Removes Director William Hinman's Bio From Website
entry.summary: Hinman worked at the commission from May 2017 through December 2020. That's it. That's the whole bio after the SEC updated the page.

entry.title: FBI Warns of AI Deepfake Extortion Scams
entry.summary: The agency says criminals are turning photos and videos into explicit content to extort victims.

entry.title: AI Art Wars: Japan Says AI Model Training Doesn’t Violate Copyright
entry.summary: Japan takes an early stand on a hot topic in generative artificial intelligence.

entry.title: Apple Reveals $3,499 Vision Pro Augmented Reality Headset
entry.summary: The long-anticipated Apple Vision Pro augmented reality headset was announced at WWDC 2023. Here's everything we know so far.

entry.title: SEC Claims Solana, Polygon, Cardano Are Securities in Binance Lawsuit
entry.summary: Other altcoins—including recent top gaming tokens SAND, MANA, and AXS— are securities too, the SEC argues.

entry.title: SEC Sues Binance and CEO for Alleged Securities Violations
entry.summary: The SEC alleges Binance and Zhao "enriched themselves by billions of U.S. dollars while placing investors’ assets at significant risk."

entry.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development
entry.summary: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Have a Meh Monday While Gaming Tokens Score Gains
entry.summary: Most of the crypto market is having a meh Monday—except for a handful of gaming and metaverse tokens.

entry.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?
entry.summary: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.

entry.title: You 'Have' to Be on Mobile: InfiniGods Cofounders on Gaming
entry.summary: InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue share their stance on why mobile gaming is essential to Web3 adoption and general success in the video games industry.

entry.title: Crypto Chaos of 2022 'Didn't Damage Technology Underlying the Industry': X Ventures Co-Founder Matthias Reiser
entry.summary: Ahead of this month's Proof of Talk event in Paris on June 14 and June 15, X Ventures co-founder and the event's co-organizer Dr. Matthias Reiser said nothing's changed for those with a "long-term view" of the industry. Still, events like the collapse of Terra and FTX in 20222 have certainly damaged investors' trust in crypto.

entry.title: Tron's Justin Sun Thinks Hong Kong Will Be a Big Fiat Onramp for Crypto
entry.summary: Justin Sun, Tron founder and advisor to crypto exchange Huobi, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly and Stacy Elliott about the impact of Hong Kong allowing residents to trade crypto, complications of restricting access based on location, and how AI will change the industry.

entry.title: NVIDIA's AI Push Could Change Gaming Forever
entry.summary: Computer tech firm NVIDIA profited off the crypto mining industry. Now, it's looking to artificial intelligence—and its stock price is soaring.

entry.title: Why InfiniGods Laughs at 'AAA' Web3 Games
entry.summary: The InfiniGods founders share their approach to game development and offer a critique of games that call themselves "AAA."

entry.title: Make it Fast, Make it Friendly: Jerome de Tychey Unpacks Key Themes at This Year's EthCC
entry.summary: After six years running, EthCC is back, this time in Paris from July 17 to July 20. Decrypt sat down with the brains behind one of Ethereum’s longest-running events Jerome de Tychey to get an inside look into what’s on the agenda this year, several unannounced guests, and the rollout of at least one “secret” DeFi project.

entry.title: Unioverse Game Preview: Hands-on With the Cinematic Proving Grounds
entry.summary: The Unioverse is a multimedia sci-fi franchise with plans to facilitate user-generated content. Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin checked out the Unioverse as Reyu, an alien character, and navigated the Proving Grounds with him. In the Proving Grounds, you'll fight an array of different drone-like flying robots (some have tentacles!!) as you navigate the puzzle-like dystopian environment. Alien meets Portal, anyone?

entry.title: EverQuest Producer Jeffrey Butler on How Ready Player One Led Him to Web3 Project Avalon
entry.summary: Jeffrey Butler started his game development career producing EverQuest. Now, he's Avalon's Chief Product Officer. Butler told Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he wants to create a customizable world where users can create their own worlds and in-game content.

entry.title: Esports Orgs Should Become More Like Tech Companies: Community Gaming CEO
entry.summary: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP conference organizer Chris Gonsalves believes crypto and tech could rejuvenate and reinvent the esports industry. In an interview, he tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why he thinks esports organizations should shake up their approach.

entry.title: SNEAK PEEK: Inside Mirandus From Gala Games
entry.summary: GG's Kate Irwin takes us on a journey inside Mirandus, the upcoming MMORPG from Gala Games.

entry.title: SNEAK PEEK: Inside Illuvium Private Beta!
entry.summary: Decrypt's GG Producer Kate Irwin offers her honest take on the Illuvium private beta, which is still in development. Take a look inside the expansive fantasy world, where RPG mechanics mix with a card-based autobattler.

entry.title: Mojo Melee Game Preview: Hands-on With the Casual Web3 Auto Battler
entry.summary: Mojo Melee is an auto battler game that offers Polygon NFTs. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin playtested the game in beta and offers his thoughts on the gameplay experience.

entry.title: How 3XP Plans to Reshape Crypto's Reputation Among Gamers
entry.summary: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP organizer Chris Gonsalves tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the first 3XP video game conference, which aims to bring together fans of crypto-enabled video games, influencers, game developers, blockchain firms, and gamers under one roof in Pasadena, California from June 8-9, 2023.

entry.title: Mark Otero Shares Why a16z Invested in Azra Games' Approach to Gaming
entry.summary: What is Azra Games' approach to NFTs in gaming? Azra Games CEO Mark Otero shares his vision and why he believes his approach was a key reason Azra received investment from venture capital firms like Andreessen Horowitz (a16z).

entry.title: Funding Web3 Film Calladita With Traditional Systems 'Wasn't Working', Says Director Miguel Faus
entry.summary: Spanish Film Director Miguel Faus talks with Decrypt about how he financed his movie “Calladita” with NFTs. In his view, Web3 and blockchain allow creators to get around some of the key difficulties present in the traditional movie industry, specifically finding funding.

entry.title: 'Web3 Offers Something Hollywood Does Not': Film3 Pioneer, Filmmaker Jordan Bayne
entry.summary: Film3 pioneer, Metacannes and The Squad founder, Jordan Bayne discusses the advantages that crypto offers to filmmakers, notably owning their work's IP throughout the entire creation, production, and distribution processes.

entry.title: Film3 Offers 'a Whole Bunch of Independent Filmmakers' Hope, Says First Flights Co-founder Nick Sadler
entry.summary: First Flights co-founder Nick Sadler sat down with Decrypt at this year's MetaCannes festival to discuss how Web3 can support independent filmmakers by leveraging its unique blockchain-powered crowdfunding platform.
